circumstances: Eric Haynes, a 10-year-old boy originally from Newport and currently in a foster situation, was reported missing from his home at 22 Marine Parade Walk, Dundee. Eyewitnesses later reported seeing Eric near a nearby construction site, leading to speculation about whether he might have wandered off to a travel-related location like the summer camp nearby. There were also unconfirmed rumors suggesting Eric had been influenced by a group with cult-like tendencies and might have attempted to live off-grid on a disused military base at 6 Lownie Road, Forfar. However, he was eventually traced by police at 23 City Road, Dundee, safe and unharmed.

Eric was last seen speaking with Kirsty Chambers, a colleague of his friend's parent, who was operating equipment at the site. It is suspected that Eric might have witnessed a crime in the vicinity, leading to his sudden absence. Later, a member of the public found Eric at 2 Herod Hill Brae, Dundee, DD4 8FG, confused and dazed, but physically unharmed. His whereabouts during the missing period remain a concern, with further investigation ongoing to determine if foul play was involved.
